contentList.content: Hound of Ill Omen

You gain the ability to call forth a howling creature of darkness to harass your foes. As a bonus action, you can spend 3 sorcery points to summon a hound of ill omen to target one creature within 36m of you.
Call forth a hound of ill omen to target one creature with its attacks. Additionally, while the hound is within [1] of the target, they have Disadvantage on Saving Throws spells you cast.
The hound appears with temporary hit points equal to your level. At the start of its turn, the hound discovers the location of the target, even if it is hidden.
Target a creature within range to become the target of the Hound of Ill Omen when summoned. The hound can only attack its target. This ability will recharge after 2 turns.

You have darkvision with a range of 36m. When you reach 3rd level, you learn the Darkness spell. In addition, you can cast it by spending 2 sorcery points or by expending a spell slot. If you cast it with sorcery points, you can see through the darkness created by the spell.
Eyes of the Dark

Your existence in a twilight state between life and death makes you difficult to defeat. When damage reduces you to 0 hit points, you instead drop to 1 hit point. You can't use this feature if you are reduced to 0 hit points by radiant damage or by a critical hit. If you successful revive, you can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.
Strength of the Grave
Shadow Sorcery
You are a creature of shadow, your magic is a gift or perhaps a curse from the shadowfell itself.
Eyes of the Dark: Darkvision
You have darkvision with a range of [1].
Set the Darkness spell to expend 2 sorcery points instead of a spell slot.
Eyes of the Dark: Darkness

You learn the Darkness spell. In addition, you can cast it by spending 2 Sorcery Points or by expending a spell slot. If you cast it with sorcery points, you can see through the darkness created by the spell.
Shadow Magic
This sorcerer is infused with shadow magic, possibly from some latent connection to the Shadowfell.
Shadow Walk
While in dim light or darkness, teleport to an unoccupied space also in dim light or darkness.
Necrotic Knowledge
Your ability to cast the plague spell has granted you a level 4 spell slot early. This will however count as your level 7 spell slot unlock.
Darkness: Enchant Item
Infuse an item with magical darkness that Heavily Obscures and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDNESS">Blinds</LSTag> creatures within [1] of it.
(Eyes of the Dark) Darkness: Enchant Item
(Eyes of the Dark) Darkness: Cloud
Shadow Curse: Resistance

Your connection to the Shadowfell grows and you become resistant to Shadow Curses. You will only be subject to the first level of Shadow Curse damage. Furthermore, when in partial or full shadows, you will receive +1 AC.
Shadow Curse: Immunity

Your connection to the Shadowfell strengthens, the shadows welcome you as one of their own. You are now immune to the Shadow Curse. Furthermore, when in partial or full shadows, you will receive +2 AC.
Endarken
A simple cantrip for a Shadow Sorcerer. The ability to extinguish light sources within a small area.
Shadow Armor
When you are in partial or full shadows you gain +1 Armor Class and an advantage on Perception checks.
Enhanced Shadow Armor
When you are in partial or full shadows you gain +2 Armor Class and an advantage on Perception and Stealth checks.
Ill Omen
While the Hound of Ill Omen is within [1] of you, you have disadvantage against saving throws from its summoner.
Ill Omen - Attack of Opportunity
You can automatically attack the enemy that is marked with Ill Omen if they move out of range.
Hunger of Hadar (Shadow Magic)

Target the shadows to summon a sphere of void energy. Creatures within this black sphere are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag> and take damage at the end of their turn and the start of their turn.

Creatures starting their turn in the area take [1]. Creatures ending their turn in the area possibly take [2].

The area is Difficult Terrain.
Shadow Blade (Shadow Magic)

The wielder has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against Lightly or Heavily Obscured targets while using this blade. <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> use the wielder's <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability Modifier</LSTag>.
Umbral Form

Transform yourself into a shadowy form for 10 rounds. In this form, you have resistance to all damage types except for Radiant and Force. You are unhindered by difficult terrain, can see through darkness and have extra movement. This can be used once per combat and lasts 10 rounds.
Dismiss Umbral Form
Dismiss your shadowy form.
You are resistant to all damage types except for Radiant and Force. You are unhindered by difficult terrain and Darkness has no effect on you, you also receive increased movement.
This form ends early if you are Incapacitated, you die or you dismiss it.
Darkness: Cloud
Create a cloud of magical darkness that Heavily Obscures and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDNESS">Blinds</LSTag> creatures within.
Wall of Darkness
(Eyes of the Dark) Wall of Darkness
Create a wall of darkness which blocks line of sight and blinds those who stand within its area of effect.
